originalLintResult.message: Ambiguous path 'index' is not allowed. Use '@index' if it is a named argument or 'this.index' if it is a property on 'this'. If it is a helper or component that has no arguments, you must either convert it to an angle bracket invocation or manually add it to the 'no-implicit-this' rule configuration, e.g. 'no-implicit-this': { allow: ['index'] }.
